SELECT a.ID, a.REAL_NAME, a.DEPART_NAME, a.TOTAL, a.WORKDAY, a.WEEKEND, a.HOLIDAY, b.USED, (a.TOTAL - b.USED) as SHENG FROM ( SELECT u.ID, u.REAL_NAME, d.NAME AS DEPART_NAME, IFNULL(sum(v.HOURS), 0) AS TOTAL, IFNULL( sum( CASE v.TYPE WHEN '0' THEN v.HOURS END ), 0 ) AS WORKDAY, IFNULL( sum( CASE v.TYPE WHEN '1' THEN v.HOURS END ), 0 ) AS WEEKEND, IFNULL( sum( CASE v.TYPE WHEN '2' THEN v.HOURS END ), 0 ) AS HOLIDAY FROM oa_hr_user u LEFT JOIN sys_depart d ON u.DEPT_ID = d.ID LEFT JOIN oa_hr_over_time v ON u.ID = v.USER_ID AND v.OPT_TYPE = '0' GROUP BY u.ID, u.REAL_NAME, d.NAME ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT u.ID, u.REAL_NAME, d.NAME, IFNULL(sum(v.HOURS), 0) AS USED FROM oa_hr_user u LEFT JOIN sys_depart d ON u.DEPT_ID = D.ID LEFT JOIN oa_hr_over_time v ON u.ID = v.USER_ID AND v.OPT_TYPE = '1' GROUP BY u.ID, u.REAL_NAME, d.NAME ) b ON a.ID = b.ID
GROUP BY a.ID, a.REAL_NAME, a.DEPART_NAME, a.TOTAL, a.WORKDAY, a.WEEKEND, a.HOLIDAY, b.USED ORDER BY a.DEPART_NAME, a.REAL_NAME
